name: Arkanoid ProtoType made by rookie :)
description:
Game counts with 3 simple levels each one becoming more difficult as it progresses, aswell as changing the ball speed.

Blue Brick takes only 1 hit to be destroyed

White Brick takes 2 hits to be destroyed

Grey Brick takes 4 hits to be destroyed

there are 4 powerups these being More balls, more lifes, extra points and  enlargement pills  :).

Game made by a rookie programmer using Game Maker Studio who has no idea how collisions work.

Hope it can get some comments on how to fix certain aspects of the game.
